Uses of Interface
de.jannlab.data.WritePort

  • Packages that use WritePort 
    Package Description
    de.jannlab  
    de.jannlab.core  
    de.jannlab.data  

    • Uses of WritePort in de.jannlab

      Methods in de.jannlab that return WritePort 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WritePort Net.inputPort()
      Returns a WritePort for writing into the inputlayer.
      WritePort Net.targetPort()
      Returns a WritePort for writing data into the outputlayer (the target output).

    • Uses of WritePort in de.jannlab.core

      Methods in de.jannlab.core that return WritePort 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WritePort NetBase.inputPort()
      Returns a WritePort for writing into the inputlayer.
      WritePort NetBase.targetPort()
      Returns a WritePort for writing data into the outputlayer (the target output).

    • Uses of WritePort in de.jannlab.data

      Subinterfaces of WritePort in de.jannlab.data 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataPort
      Combines the ReadPort and the WritePort as a shorthand.
      Methods in de.jannlab.data with parameters of type WritePort 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Sample.map(WritePort input, WritePort target)
      Maps input and target into two write ports.
      void Sample.map(WritePort input, WritePort target, int seqidx)
      Maps input and target into two write ports.
      void Sample.mapInput(WritePort input)
      Map the input into a write port.
      void Sample.mapInput(WritePort input, int seqidx)
      Maps the input into a write port for a specific seq. index.
      void Sample.mapInput(WritePort input, int[] selection)
      Maps the input into a write port only for a given selection.
      void Sample.mapInput(WritePort input, int seqidx, int[] selection)
      Maps the input into a write port only for a given selection and a specific seq. index.
      void Sample.mapTarget(WritePort target)
      Maps the target into a write port.
      void Sample.mapTarget(WritePort target, int seqidx)
      Maps the target into a write port only for a given selection and a specific seq. index.
      void Sample.mapTarget(WritePort target, int[] selection)
      Maps the target into a write port only for a given selection.
      void Sample.mapTarget(WritePort target, int seqidx, int[] selection)
      Maps the target into a write port only for a given selection and specific seq. index.
